mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Empowering Data-Driven Excellence
mission.description: We're on a mission to help organizations maintain the highest standards of dashboard quality, ensuring data-driven decisions are based on reliable insights.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To become the global standard for dashboard quality assurance in the data analytics industry.

values.title: Values
values.description: Innovation, reliability, and customer success drive everything we do.

impact.title: Impact
impact.description: Helping organizations make better decisions through quality data visualization.

2020.title: The Beginning
2020.description: Founded with a vision to revolutionize dashboard quality monitoring

2021.title: First Major Release
2021.description: Launched support for Tableau and Looker integration

2022.title: Enterprise Expansion
2022.description: Added enterprise-grade features and security capabilities

2023.title: Global Growth
2023.description: Expanded to serve clients across 30+ countries

items.name: Armand Totti
items.content: QDT has transformed how we monitor our dashboard quality. The real-time alerts have helped us catch issues before they impact our users.

items.name: Michael Rodriguez
items.content: The integration with multiple BI platforms made QDT an essential tool for our organization. We've seen a 40% reduction in data quality incidents.

items.name: Emma Thompson
items.content: QDT's automated monitoring has saved our team countless hours. The intuitive interface makes it easy to track and improve our dashboard quality.
